comments.author: o_e_l_e_o
comments.body: Quote from: digaran on June 24, 2023, 08:52:22 PMTheir difference is the same as F = fffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffefffffc2fThis is the finite field over which secp256k1 is defined. It is more commonly given the symbol p. Any calculations done in secp256k1 need to be done modulo p.So to invert a y coordinate over the x axis like this, you simply do -y = p-yThis explains why the difference between your two y coordinates is p.
